item.title: Learning Front-End Notes
item.description: 零散笔记 2018-4-19 du 就是 disk usage 命令 linux du -d 1 -h 查看 depth 为 1 的文件夹的存贮大小 2018-4-20 boilerplate: 样板 eg: a boilerplate to use in CS-546 assignments exert: 发挥 exerts some control over the alignment of items when they overflow the line learning bootstrap A complete Guide to FlexBox Properties for the flex containers .container { display: flex; flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse flex-flow: row | nowrap (default); justify-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly; align-items: flex-start | flex-end | stretch | center | baseline align-content: flex-start | flex-end | stretch | center | space-between | space-around } Properties for the flex items
